summary: Life long learner. I love learning stuff.
Python Developer - in Tata Consultancy Service(2022-2024).

Self-independent, reliable and friendly individual who works hard to achieve his goals.
Adaptable quickly, and organised well. Interested in learning the latest web & software technologies quickly.
Special Interest in PYTHON, AI/ML, RUST, FLUTTER.
Able to work well in teams as well as individually. My future goal is to become a AI/ML developer.
